description: This file defines a React-like component named GameControls, using the Qwik framework, that provides UI controls for toggling game modes (PvP/CPU), resetting the game board, and starting a new game in a Tic-Tac-Toe game application.

methods.name: GameControls
methods.description: A component that renders game mode toggle and control buttons for a Tic-Tac-Toe game.

methods.name: handleToggle
methods.description: Internal event handler to change game mode based on toggle state.
